de.javanarior.utils.lang.reflect

Class Retrieve

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.javanarior.utils.lang.reflect.Retrieve

  • public final class Retrieve
extends Object
    Retrieve values from Java Elements e.g. Annotations.

    • Method Detail

      • annotationValueOnClass

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnClass(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                   String attributeName,
                                                   Class<?> annotatedClass)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation attribute/method on a Class. To be more precise returns the value of attributeName from annationClass on annotatedClass. In case of error a ReflectionException is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - a annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - the class of the Annotation
        attributeName - - name of the attribute
        annotatedClass - - the class with the Annotation
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute

      • annotationValueOnClass

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnClass(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                   Class<?> annotatedClass)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation on a Class. The Attribute/Method 'value' is assumed as default. To be more precise returns the value of value from annationClass on annotatedClass. In case of error a ReflectionException is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - a annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - the class of the Annotation
        annotatedClass - - the class with the Annotation
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute

      • annotationValueOnMethod

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnMethod(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                    Method methodWithAnnotation,
                                                    String attributeName)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation on a Method. To be more precise returns the value of attributeName from annationClass on methodWithAnnotation. In case of error a ReflectionException is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - a annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - the class of the Annotation
        methodWithAnnotation - - method with annotation
        attributeName - - name of the attribute
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute

      • annotationValueOnMethod

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnMethod(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                    String attributeName,
                                                    Class<?> classWithMethod,
                                                    String methodName,
                                                    Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation on a Method. To be more precise returns the value of attributeName of annotationClass from methodName of classWithMethod. In case of error a ReflectionException is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - a annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - the class of the Annotation
        attributeName - - name of the attribute
        classWithMethod - - class with the method
        methodName - - name of method with the annotation
        parameterTypes - - parameter types of methodName
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute

      • annotationValueOnMethod

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnMethod(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                    Method method)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation on a Method. The Attribute/Method 'value' is assumed as default. To be more precise returns the value of value from annationClass on method. In case of error a ReflectionException is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - a annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - the class of the Annotation
        method - - the method with the Annotation
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute

      • annotationValueOnMethod

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnMethod(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                    Class<?> classWithMethod,
                                                    String methodName,
                                                    Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation on a Method. The Attribute/Method 'value' is assumed as default. To be more precise returns the value of value from annationClass of methodName of annotatedClass. In case of error a ReflectionException is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - a annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - the class of the Annotation
        classWithMethod - - class with method
        methodName - - name of method with annotation
        parameterTypes - - parameter types of methodName
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute

      • annotationValueOnParameter

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnParameter(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                       String attributeName,
                                                       Class<?> classWithMethod,
                                                       String methodNameWithParameter,
                                                       String parameterName,
                                                       Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation on a method parameter. Returns the value of attributeName from annotationClass The Annotation is expected at the Method methodNameWithParameter in the class classWithMethod. If the Method is polymorphic overriden, the Signature can be provided with parameterTypes.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - the annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - class of the annotation
        attributeName - - name of the attribute
        classWithMethod - - class of the method
        methodNameWithParameter - - the method name
        parameterName - - name of the parameter
        parameterTypes - - Types of the method
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute

      • annotationValueOnParameter

        public static <T extends Annotation> Object annotationValueOnParameter(Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                       Class<?> classWithMethod,
                                                       String methodNameWithParameter,
                                                       String parameterName,
                                                       Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Retrieve the value of an Annotation on a method parameter. The Attribute/Method 'value' is assumed as default. Returns the value of 'value' from annotationClass The Annotation is expected at the Method methodNameWithParameter in the class classWithMethod. If the Method is polymorphic overridden, the Signature can be provided with parameterTypes.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - the annotation class
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - - class of the annotation
        classWithMethod - - class of the method
        methodNameWithParameter - - the method name
        parameterName - - name of the parameter
        parameterTypes - - Types of the method parameter
        Returns:
        value of the annotation attribute
